item.title: ChatBot Platform
item.description: Earlytime creates an autonomus knowledge base powered by Artificial Intelligence. The knowledge base is easy to access, always up to date and includes on the field know-how.

item.title: Company’s DNA
item.description: We are working with the Canopé network to propose a learning platform and collaborate with the National Education. This is our cause and our DNA. The team spends 20% of the time on this project, and soon, a usable prototype will be open to the public. For more information please contact us !

item.title: How to make sure your next product or service launch drives growth
Our conviction is that Knowledge increases by sharing but not by saving
item.description: EarlyTime creates artificial intelligence to assist employees in their daily tasks and accelerate the knowledge and skill sharing. We dematerialize your company, managers, experts and make them available instantly and simultaneously to users. Also, we mobilize all human resources and virtual assistants to provide a solution for each employee’s question. EarlyTime offers a unique feature: e-DZO : a personal coach for each employee. It manages access to knowledge and offers an adaptive training path customized to everyone’s personal need.

item.title: Our conviction is that Knowledge increases by sharing but not by saving
item.description: EarlyTime creates artificial intelligence to assist employees in corporations in their daily tasks and accelerate the knowledge and skill sharing. We dematerialize your company, managers, experts and make them available instantly and simultaneously to users. Also, we mobilize all human resources and virtual assistants to provide a solution for each employee’s question.

item.title: Team
item.description: A solid, complementary, experienced team enjoying this fabulous journey of transforming the knowledge organization in corporations

item.title: e-DZO
item.description: e-Dzo is a virtual coach able to collect information through a simple dialogue, respond to questions, find solutions to regularly encountered problems, make recommendations, train individuals. e-Dzo is smart, intuitive and adapts to users. He integrates each team to capture, organise, store, spread and make the team’s knowledge widely available in your company. e-Dzo is an avatar of teams’ expertise. He is powered by artificial intelligence, and becomes the team’s memory holder, responsible for mastering the team’s know-how and expertise to provide it easily and instantaneously to any employee who may need it.

item.title: e-DZO’s team
item.description: «Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.» Benjamin Franklin

item.title: e-Dzo Users
item.description: e-dzo provides an adaptative learning path to improve your skills and help you increase clients’ satisfaction.
